name: Urscrum
tagline: The most modern solution for your SCRUM needs
body:
### Urscrum - Project Site.
This is the beginning of an awesome journey. At Codelight we've decided to build the most awesome and modern software platform to get your SCRUM done right. We aim to use cutting-edge technology, great visuals and the most wonderful user experience we can think of.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
